name: AICTE Pragati Scholarship
benefits: ₹50,000 per year for female students pursuing technical education.
requiredCertificates: Aadhaar card, Admission proof, Bonafide certificate.

name: 7.5% Quota Scholarship
benefits: Full tuition fee waiver for Govt. school students under 7.5% reservation.
requiredCertificates: Community certificate, Income certificate, School Bonafide.

name: Post Matric Scholarship
benefits: Covers tuition, exam fees, and maintenance allowance.
requiredCertificates: Community certificate, Income certificate, Aadhaar card.

name: EVR Nagammai Memorial Scholarship
benefits: ₹25,000 per year for female postgraduate Arts & Science students.
requiredCertificates: Degree mark sheet, Income certificate, Aadhaar card.

name: Minority Arts Scholarship
benefits: Tuition fee waiver for minority students in Arts courses.
requiredCertificates: Minority certificate, Income proof, Bonafide certificate.

name: AICTE Saksham Scholarship
benefits: ₹50,000 per year for differently-abled technical students.
requiredCertificates: Disability certificate, Admission proof, Aadhaar card.
